医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，独立医生在 COVID-19 期间的实践更具弹性大型卫生系统正在以惊人的速度收购规模较小的医生诊所，从而留下更少的独立诊所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Independent-physical-practices-more-resilient-during-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Independent-physical-practices-more-resilient-during-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21478ffb-f8e2-4bf6-ae68-5330a4691a13 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 22:12:02 -0400 Independent physician practices more resilient during COVID-19, study finds
适合步行的社区可降低女性患肥胖相关癌症的风险哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，居住在更适合步行的社区可以降低女性患整体肥胖相关癌症的风险，特别是绝经后乳腺癌，还可以预防卵巢癌、子宫内膜癌和多发性骨髓瘤。纽约大学格罗斯曼医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walkable-neighborhoods-reduce-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancers-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walkable-neighborhoods-reduce-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancers-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18f40ba4-f844-4384-ac1f-66efb4731540 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:54:40 -0400 Walkable neighborhoods reduce risk of obesity-related cancers in women
突破性研究侧重于大脑健康监测、神经退行性疾病的早期检测奥卢大学副教授 Teemu Myllylä 是生物医学工程领域的领先专家，他最近在最近的 6G 支持的可持续社会活动中讨论了他的团队在大脑健康监测和神经退行性疾病早期检测方面的开创性工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Groundwriting-research-focuses-on-brain-health-monitoring-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Groundwriting-research-focuses-on-brain-health-monitoring-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2903123-57f6-4af4-989b-54cf35fdb065 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:46:40 -0400 Groundbreaking research focuses on brain health monitoring, early detection of neurodegenerative diseases
研究证实维也纳预测模型静脉血栓栓塞的准确性预测模型可用于识别受静脉血栓栓塞影响的人，这些人的复发风险较低，并且可能不需要长期血液稀释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-confirms-accuracy-of-Vienna-Prediction-Model-for-venous-thrombembolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-confirms-accuracy-of-Vienna-Prediction-Model-for-venous-throboembolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a8de2cc-c3d7-47dd-a78e-72606d4e00a1 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:39:26 -0400 Study confirms accuracy of Vienna Prediction Model for venous thromboembolism
治疗慢性脊髓损伤的新策略导致前肢功能恢复发表在同行评审的《神经创伤杂志》上的一项新研究展示了一种治疗大鼠慢性脊髓损伤的策略，该策略可以使瘫痪的前肢和爪子功能恢复以及手指的精确运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-strategy-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury-leads-to-function-recovery-of-the-forelimb.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-strategy-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury-leads-to-function-recovery-of-the-forelimb.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40708ff8-e4de-4b0d-9f03-7194892632cd Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:14:09 -0400 New strategy for treating chronic spinal cord injury leads to functional recovery of the forelimb
器官芯片模型揭示淋巴水肿在波士顿大学生物医学工程师 Chris Chen 博士与人共同撰写的一项新的 PNAS 研究中，研究人员表示，他们越来越接近了解淋巴水肿的奥秘。由于淋巴系统故障而导致体内积液的一种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Organ-on-chip-model-sheds-light-on-lymphedema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Organ-on-chip-model-sheds-light-on-lymphedema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4323ade-7f1c-4e99-b8c0-8905abe3a994 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:07:52 -0400 Organ-on-chip model sheds light on lymphedema
新的工作流程可以显着减少紧急姑息放射治疗的等待时间一项新的研究表明，使用以前进行的诊断性计算机断层扫描 (CT) 扫描代替 CT 模拟扫描来计划简单的姑息性放射治疗可以大大减少人们等待紧急治疗的时间，从而改善患者的体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-workflow-could-significantly-reduce-wait-time-for-urgent-palliative-radiation-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-workflow-could-significantly-reduce-wait-time-for-urgent-palliative-radiation-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c73b521-568b-4f6d-97c4-39f7531547e7 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:57:45 -0400 New workflow could significantly reduce wait time for urgent palliative radiation therapy
维生素 D 和遗传学如何塑造早期大脑发育该研究调查了孕妇及其 3-5 岁孩子的维生素 D 水平和维生素 D 结合蛋白基因型如何影响儿童早期神经发育。研究结果表明，儿童维生素 D 浓度较高与较好的神经发育评分相关，此外还有社会人口因素和某些遗传变异的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/How-vitamin-D-and-genics-shape-early-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/How-vitamin-D-and-genics-shape-early-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d227f53b-c737-4746-9d6f-e432d4e4fa36 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:54:00 -0400 How vitamin D and genetics shape early brain development
口服脂质纳米颗粒药物有望预防小鼠结肠炎相关癌症佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，一种口服脂质纳米颗粒药物可以预防小鼠肿瘤的发展，这表明这是一种有前途的预防结肠炎相关癌症的药物制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Oral-lipid-nanoarticle-drug-shows-promise-for-preventing-colitis-linked-cancer-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Oral-lipid-nanoarticle-drug-shows-promise-for-preventing-colitis-linked-cancer-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34e09776-4200-4b41-9d18-2e9266796e7e Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:52:18 -0400 Oral lipid nanoparticle drug shows promise for preventing colitis-associated cancer in mice
代谢健康肥胖背后的脂肪组织功能障碍今年欧洲糖尿病研究协会年会的一次会议将探讨代谢健康肥胖 (MHO) 概念的最新数据——公众更常称之为“肥胖但健康”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-adipose-tissue-dysfunction-behind-metabolically-healthy-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-adipose-tissue-dysfunction-behind-metabolically-healthy-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=012698c8-a404-44af-8740-977e22440778 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:40:05 -0400 The adipose tissue dysfunction behind metabolically healthy obesity
